solution_line_template: Two aeroplanes require {legos_per_airplane} legos/airplane x {num_airplanes} airplanes = <<{legos_per_airplane}*{num_airplanes}={total_legos_needed}>>{total_legos_needed} legos.
Julian needs {total_legos_needed} legos - {julian_has_legos} legos = <<{total_legos_needed}-{julian_has_legos}={legos_needed_more}>>{legos_needed_more} more legos
